products.title: Vitra Blackout Beige Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Beige Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £8.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Make a smart update with the neat and functional design of the Vitra Blackout Roller blind. The neutral beige fabric is perfect for blending with a range of home styles. Mix with a minimalist monochrome scheme or team with mocha and cream tones for a warmer look. Either way, this versatile blind is bright and uplifting for your space and boasts blackout functionality too.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX0527 Fabric Colour: Beige Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout Beige Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Beige Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Cream. Made to measure from £38.98 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular blackout fabrics.  In several fresh, bright shades, this fabric is a  great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern Aluminium framework. 
 
This blackout fabric has a colour match backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.

products.title: Vitra Beige (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Vitra Beige (Blackout) Blackout Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Beige Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Beige Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. 
 Revamp your home or office space with a stunning Vitra Blackout Beige roller blind. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach.
